alert.note: Alert for Brown; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 25 at 8:24PM MST until December 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Brown and Spink Counties. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
